Shoe - Class in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: Shoe.java

Project: cardgames

Description: A Shoe of Cards for use in card games

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Shoe(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
default constructor builds a single Deck Shoe using Decks of type 'deckType'
shuffle() - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DeckIntfc
shuffle the Deck
shuffle() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
shuffle the Deck - Does NOT include Cards from discards pile - run addDiscards() first to include discarded Cards in shuffle
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Hand
returns the number of Cards in the Hand
size() - Method in interface com.nickeson.game.cardgame.DeckIntfc
 
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.Shoe
returns the number of Cards in the Shoe
size() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
returns the number of Cards in the Deck
sortByIndexValue() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Hand
Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same indexValue are grouped together, and within an indexValue the Cards are sorted by suit - indexValues proceed in an ascending fashion
sortBySuit() - Method in class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.blackjack.Hand
Sorts the cards in the Hand so that cards of the same suit are grouped together, and within a suit the cards are sorted by value ascending.
StdDeck - Class in com.nickeson.game.cardgame
Title: StdDeck.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: A Standard Playing Card Deck built with options from an options Map

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

StdDeck() - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
default constructor builds a StdDeck with no Jokers
StdDeck(Map<String, Object>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.game.cardgame.StdDeck
convenience constructor allows us to pass an options Map and build Deck using options from the Map
